mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ide_application_list (application_name, application_description, created_by, created_date, updated_by, updated_date) VALUES (#{applicationName}, #{applicationDescription}, #{createdBy}, #{createdDate}, #{updatedBy}, #{updatedDate})
mapper.select: SELECT application_id , application_name , application_description , created_by , created_date , updated_by , updated_date FROM ide_application_list ORDER BY application_name ASC
